channel.title: The Horror of Dolores Roach
channel.description: With blood on her hands, the infamous Dolores Roach has fled the recent shocking destruction in Washington Heights and gone into hiding deep under New York City in an abandoned subway tunnel. But she’s not alone underground, and her dark night of the soul is interrupted by an extremist faction of similarly self-exiled tunnel-dwellers whose space she's invaded. Facing re-incarceration back above ground, but pushed to the limits of shame, paranoia, lust, hunger, and depraved entrepreneurialism below it, Dolores is the outcast of the outcasts again - until she takes her survival in the tunnels into her own Magic Hands. Season 2 of The Horror of Dolores Roach is written and directed by Aaron Mark and stars Daphne Rubin-Vega, Donnell Rawlings, and Amy Ryan.

item.title: S2 Ep. 5: THE SINGLE GREATEST THREAT TO OUR SURVIVAL
item.description: What are the f**kin’ odds?Created by Aaron Mark. With performances by Daphne Rubin-Vega, Luca Costanzo and Amy Ryan.Written and directed by Aaron Mark. Executive producer Mimi O’Donnell. Senior producer Katie Pastore. Producer Daphne Rubin-Vega. Associate producer MR Daniel. Recording and engineering by Armando Serrano. Sound design, foley recording and mix by Daniel Brunelle. Score by Allison Leyton-Brown. The Horror of Dolores Roach is a production of Gimlet Media.Soundtrack out on October 31.https://gimletmedia.com/shows/dolores-roach Learn more about your ad choices. item.title: S1 Ep. 8 I Can Feel it in My Stomach
item.description: S**t goes down, cause that's what s**t does. Dolores Roach- Daphne Rubin-Vega, Luis Batista- Bobby Cannavale, Jonah Pearlman- Noah Robbins, Joy- Margaret Cho, Nellie- Kita Updike, Caleb Seltzer- Michael Urie, Jeremiah- John Douglas Thompson, MTA Voice- Jasmine RomeroWritten and directed by Aaron Mark, executive produced by Mimi O’Donnell, produced by Katie Pastore, Matthew Boll and Daphne Rubin-Vega, associate produced by MR Daniel.
